ticket.text: VPN stopped working after the latest update. I can't connect to any internal resources.

triage.summary: User cannot connect to internal resources due to VPN issues after an update.
triage.ticket_text: VPN stopped working after the latest update. I can't connect to any internal resources.

resolution.reply:
```json
{
  "steps": [
    "Ensure the VPN client is updated to the latest version.",
    "Restart your system before attempting to reconnect to the VPN.",
    "Verify your internet connection is stable and that you can browse external websites.",
    "If you see 'authentication failed,' reset your Active Directory password.",
    "If the connection drops repeatedly, consider switching to a wired connection or a different network."
  ],
  "reply": "Hi, it seems your VPN issue may be related to the recent update. Please follow the steps provided to troubleshoot the connection. Let me know if you need further assistance!"
}
```

ticket.text: My laptop is super slow and overheating when I open Outlook and Teams.

triage.summary: The laptop is slow and overheating when using Outlook and Teams.
triage.ticket_text: My laptop is super slow and overheating when I open Outlook and Teams.

resolution.reply:
```json
{
  "steps": [
    "Run a full system reboot to refresh the laptop.",
    "Check for background apps consuming high CPU, especially Outlook and Teams.",
    "Ensure that you have more than 10GB of free disk space available.",
    "Run 'Disk Cleanup' to remove unnecessary files.",
    "Uninstall any unused applications that may be slowing down the system.",
    "Keep your antivirus definitions up to date to ensure optimal performance."
  ],
  "reply": "Hi, I recommend following these steps to improve your laptop's performance. Please let me know if the issue persists after trying them!"
}
```
